column2: this time for a 2 person dinner date. We got papaya salad and some sashimi for apps
column3: and rolls for entrees and some drinks. The food is still decent but service definitely was not as good as when we had a larger party. Obviously Kata is still on the pricier end compared to other sushi joints but you get what you pay for to a degree. The service this time was a bit slow
column4: our request to be moved because it was super cold due to the AC was totally ignored by our server.
